X-Hive/DB 7.0.0

Uses of Interface
org.w3c.dom.traversal.DocumentTraversal

Packages that use DocumentTraversal
com.xhive.core.interfaces This package contains the X-Hive core interfaces, that give access to database (meta-)information, database users and authorities, and control the connection to the database (including transaction control). 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces This package contains the library interfaces (for collections of documents) and X-Hive specific extensions to the W3C DOM Interfaces, as well as interfaces related to special DOM related data. 
com.xhive.dom.xlink.interfaces This package contains W3C XLink convenience classes: (1) a utility class with basic link-resolution, link-expansion and link-management functions (2) a DOM XLink API where users can retrieve XLink information from DOM nodes.

          Get a DocumentTraversal object.
